ygData.subject: Re: rts and skull of jhen tra
ygData.msgSnippet: RE: [EverQuest] rts and skull of jhen trado you know where I can get it? seems the enchanter class might be useful after all... ... From: Tom Wang To:
ygData.messageBody:
RE: [EverQuest] rts and skull of jhen trado you know where I can get it?
seems the enchanter class might be useful after all...
----- Original Message -----
From: Tom Wang
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 9:34 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] rts and skull of jhen tra


Its called Staff of Writhing or Writhing Staff and is 1 (one) hand blunt. Its gotten in a really really tough place for 30 + people. Its stats are awesome of course, however, we clerics cannot use it. Its restricted to true casters like wizards and enchanters. Which is too bad as most of them suck at 1h blunt.
----- Original Message -----
From: Whitmore, Lance
To: 'EverQuest@onelist.com'
Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 8:12 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] rts and skull of jhen tra


its not a rumor... ive seen to Players running around in Crushbone weilding a staff with a skull on the end of it... just like the priest of discord.

Duhase

-----Original Message-----
From: Jannus Malus [mailto:jannus_@...]
Sent: Friday, May 28, 1999 2:35 PM
To: everquest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] rts and skull of jhen tra



From: "Jannus Malus" <jannus_@...>

I've heard that the runed totem staff and skull of jhen tra can be used
together/in conjunction with each other, yet there is no obvious way to do
this. Is this information wrong, or am I just missing something? Thanks in
advance.
Jannus
